author: TrustyJAID
description: Trigger events based on regular expressions
install_msg: Add trigger responses to regex, see <https://regex101.com/> for help building regex expressions. This will create and save files/images locally for those triggers. To use resized images pillow must be installed although this is not a requirement for other triggers. For a simple guide on how to use the features of this cog check out https://github.com/TrustyJAID/Trusty-cogs/blob/master/retrigger/README.md
name: Trigger events via regular expressions
